Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory66.jpg'}
{3: 'City 173, outside the Holy Church - Nov 3rd, 10:29 AM'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Hey, Lofte. You on patrol duty today? What are you looking at outside the church?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: 'Oh hi, Toby. Yeah, I got thrown all the patrol missions ever since you took time off to nurse your injuries.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: 'Wow, sorry for the extra work, haha. Here, something for your hard work.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Toby throws a pack of MRE rations at Lofte.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: 'Oh come off it, you. Are those provisions for the church?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: "Sigh, that old man Kaif, always asking you to help with deliveries. It's fine when you were healthy but how can your wounds heal now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: 'Nah, I just treat it as rehabilitation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Toby', 3: "Enough about me, I remember today is not a holy day, why's the church so noisy?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: "It's been like that ever since that sister came to this church.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: 'Yeah, an army from Kuzath Snow Plain stopped by a while ago, they left a sister here and continued down south with the other survivors.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: 'Oh, I remember them. Their leader looked tough. I wonder if my arrows are faster than his blades, hehe.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Having said that, Toby raises his left arm to chest level with the supply crate in hand, while making a drawing motion with his right hand, aiming for a point beyond the horizon and mimicking the sounds of shooting arrows himself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: "Can't you just take it easy for a day...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "How can I protect you all if I don't train constantly?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: "Alright, alright, let me continue. That sister... I think she's called Bianca?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "Bianca... I've been hearing that name quite a lot recently.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Toby stops making shooting motions and recalls some recent conversations he had overheard.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory49.jpg'}
{2: 'Sister A', 3: 'Did you hear? That newcomer got into quite a lot of trouble and everyone was afraid of her, so she got abandoned here at our church.'}
{2: 'Sister B', 3: '...I heard she killed the father who raised her up.'}
{2: 'Sister C', 3: 'Oh my Lord!'}
{2: 'Sister A', 3: 'I can\'t believe a church raised a sister like that, no, more like a "witch"...'}
{2: 'Sister C', 3: "Hmph, she didn't even deny it when asked, she's definitely guilty if you ask me."}
{2: 'Sister B', 3: "Ahem, someone's coming over."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory76.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen A', 3: "Sigh, there've been disappearances more and more lately, even that homeless old man's gone.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "Speaking of him, I remember seeing him with that new sister from the church before, you don't think...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen A', 3: "I think you're on to something here. Come to think of it, we started seeing more people going missing after that Bianca came here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "Then it must've been her! We should chase her out of town and then we'll be safe.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen A', 3: "I know, right? It's so obvious but those soldiers are still doing nothing! Why are we paying taxes to feed those slackers?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "Who in their right mind would want to become a soldier anyway if not for the current situation? Except for Toby, that kid's an exception.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen A', 3: 'Yeah, good kids like him are rare to come by nowadays.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "Shh, she's coming over, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory66.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: 'I heard she killed the father who raised her on the snow plains.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Toby is pulled back to reality by Lofte's voice. Following Lofte's gaze, he sees a blond girl sitting in a corner all by herself."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "Yeah... but I think she's just misunderstood. She may look cold, but I don't think she's a bad person.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: 'Ha, only you would think that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Toby waves at Bianca passionately, catching the attention of those in the church.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lofte', 3: "Welp, it's time for guard duty so I'll see you later. Though I suggest you keep your distance from her.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Toby could reply, the crowd that has caught sight of Toby swarmed over.'}
{2: 'Father Leon', 3: 'Toby!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "Good afternoon, Father Leon. Here's the provisions for this week.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Toby places the supply crate on the ground and taps on the monitor of the crate a few times.'}
{3: 'The supply crate opens up on all four sides, revealing the supplies inside.'}
{2: 'Father Leon', 3: "Thank you, Toby. Looks like Kaif's being lazy again. But I heard you were recovering from your injuries, why are you out here working?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "They're pretty much healed already, but thanks for asking, Father.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "Long time no see, Toby! Heard you got hurt in the last battle, you've got us worried sick.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "I'm fine, I'm fine. 'Tis but a scratch. Look, I'm healthy as a horse!", 4: '1'}

{3: 'Toby runs his fingers through his brilliant blond hair while his right hand reaches for his bow on his back. He then poses in a way which he thought looks cool, causing the bystanders to laugh, consequently lifting the mood.'}
{2: 'Father Leon', 3: "We're all happy that you've recovered. All right, we shan't hold you up. Come, there's a supply pack for everyone."}
{3: 'The father claps his hands and the people gathered around Toby swiftly form a line.'}
{3: 'Everyone prays in front of the supply crate before taking their own share. The whole process proceeds without a hitch.'}

{3: 'Toby notices that Bianca stood at the end of the line the whole time with no intention to come forward and claim her supplies, so he takes out a supply pack from the crate and heads over to Bianca.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "Hey there, are you feeling unwell? Here's your share of the provisions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Toby', 3: "Also, here's a flower for a lovely lady like you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Toby holds out the supply pack to Bianca, and on top of the pack lies a single white lily.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'No, thank you. Though I do appreciate the thought.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "What? But you'll starve! That...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Toby could finish his sentence, a woman inserts herself between them, putting a stop to the conversation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sister A', 3: "Toby, don't mind her. She said she doesn't need it so just leave her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Father Leon', 3: 'You, where are your manners?!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen C', 3: "Yeah! Come over here, Toby, don't mind her.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen C', 3: "Sorry about her, Toby. She's always like this. You should just stay away from her. Oh right, I heard there have been disappearances nearby here lately too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Citizen B', 3: "It's getting more and more worrisome, you should be careful too.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With everyone's attention on him, Toby cannot continue his conversation with Bianca. Instead, he addresses the crowd."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Toby', 3: "Don't worry, I'll protect each and every one of you! It's my duty as a soldier after all!", 4: '1'}
